ai-ja474:1.3_0: Now you have no idea for you,
ai-ja474:1.4_0: will appear to him in the fruit of trees.”
ai-ja474:2.2_0: May I not see a moment not consult in a moment,
ai-ja474:2.3_0: and evening the courtesan, he received the bribe,
ai-ja474:2.4_0: or leaves in the mango fruit.”
ai-ja474:3.2_0: for a moment, you won’t be in the past.
ai-ja474:3.3_0: he picked up a large fruit,
ai-ja474:4.1_0: for I have been smeared with sweetness.
ai-ja474:4.2_0: appear to him in the fruit of trees,
ai-ja474:4.4_0: this is the Dhamma for you today?”
ai-ja474:5.2_0: we have transmigrated in the Dhamma.
ai-ja474:5.3_0: Do not ask what I have been given to me.
ai-ja474:5.4_0: Awakened by a secret, an idiot may get rid of hate,
ai-ja474:6.1_0: Being unable to spring up with people,
ai-ja474:7.2_0: Then the Vāliya, having fallen from Pālileyyaka,
ai-ja474:8.3_0: That one might know the Dhamma
ai-ja474:9.2_0: Having taken a stone, he took a sword from the ground:
ai-ja474:9.3_0: * He who with his supreme hands was setting forth,
ai-ja474:9.4_0: I’ll stuck out him with my own conceit.”
ai-ja474:10.2_0: I was not covered with my nest!
ai-ja474:10.3_0: to give up dark deeds with dark results,
ai-ja474:10.4_0: Like a blind man on a blind man.
ai-ja474:10.5_0: Like this, he said to me:
ai-ja474:11.3_0: I was pleased when you heard.
ai-ja474:11.4_0: while standing righteously, he won’t give it up.
ai-ja474:12.1_0: That fool who, having obtained (all) a fool with wisdom,
ai-ja474:12.2_0: It’s hard today in the world
ai-ja474:12.3_0: Even if someone gains little wisdom,
ai-ja474:13.3_0: We don’t give to you such thoughts.
ai-ja474:13.4_0: Where do you not come from me?”
